topics.body:
"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c5adb6368720dd3d10100#post_548c5adb6368720dd3d10100
You're new?
And yet you have 6455 posts.

I've been here for OVER A YEAR and I don't have that many posts.


"@Patologička":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c5ae06368723396e10100#post_548c5ae06368723396e10100
Just so you know, there are a few 'unofficial rules' of the forums that I totally didn't make up.

1. Every conversation can - and will - come back to Revengeance.
2. If Rule 1 is defied, then it will come back to Yuugi from Touhou instead.
3. Trashboat will post whatever the hell he wants.
4. Number1Pegasus fights for his friends
5. I tip the scales around here.
6. If you go near the Fetishes thread, be ready to see some _weird shit_.
